Class ReserveSeats

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReserveSeats

  • public class ReserveSeats
extends java.lang.Object
    Comp 1502 Fall 2018 Assignment 1 – Plane Reservation System Date Given: Sept 14, 2018 Date Due: Oct 1, 2018 at midnight in the submit drive ReserveSeats class performs all the functions of the seat reservation including printing reports

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NUM_COLUMNS
